document_data.name: Theskyn's hearty heave
document_data.mainbody: '''''Theskyn's hearty heave''''' was an [[evocation]] spell that created a blast of force.
document_data.Effects: Casting this spell caused a blast of force to project from the caster, pushing away creatures that may have surrounded them.
document_data.History: This spell was created by [[Theskyn]], a court mage who served the Stag King of [[Athalantar]].
